issue.title: [CI] Disable 3rdparty fuzzit nightly builds
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6725](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6725). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Docker-cpp-fuzzit docker-compose task fails currently, probably misses 
parameters like version, git object id and credentials. 
Disable it until we have a solid solution for running them regularly.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6725?focusedCommentId=16940507) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5528
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5528>
